## buildTreeState variable

converts hexes of tree roots to Hashes

**Signature:**

```typescript
buildTreeState: (state: string | undefined, claimsTreeRoot: string | undefined, revocationTreeRoot: string | undefined, rootOfRoots: string | undefined) => TreeState
```
